name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-image-slider-list-taxonomy-filter
title: Image Slider from Photo Gallery using Taxonomy Filter
shortDescription: This web part display the image in slider based on the filter of Taxonomy from Property panel. Images are stored in PhotoGallery and tagged with Taxonomy.
longDescription: This web part display the image in slider based on the filter of Taxonomy from Property panel. Images are stored in PhotoGallery and tagged with Taxonomy.

thumbnails.alt: Image Slider from Photo Gallery using Taxonomy Filter
